entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] timeout in System.Runtime.Tests #76110
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: {Last}IndexOf{AnyExcept}Range #76106
    8.0.0
  • List<> should use faster write barriers #76104
  • [wasm][debugger] Catch another unhandled exception in .js file after catching First Chance Exception #76101
    8.0.0
  • Address-exposure of promoted struct fields used by instance methods #76096
    8.0.0
  • [External] Consumption of external source has suppressed warnings #76095
    8.0.0
  • #73155 Remove 1024 character limit on ODBC connection strings Fix works in .NET 6 but not in Framework 4.X #76094
  • Mono interpreter crashing when calling constructor with 1000 parameters #76093
  • JIT/CheckProjects tool isn't used correctly in CI #76087
  • .NET Logging after IHost Shutdown #76084
  • ILGenerator.Emit produces Method not found #76082
  • Loading a self-contained executable with custom runtime host returns error about missing .deps.json file #76080
  • [NativeAOT] Switch to native arm64 msvc toolset #76079
    8.0.0
  • WASM: GL object no longer accessible in .net 7 (Skiasharp) #76077
    7.0.x
  • JIT: Improve last-use copy omission for implicit byrefs #76069
    8.0.0
  • Suboptimal ASM emmited for Vector256<T>.Zero and Vector128<T>.Zero #76067
    Future
  • Operations on halfs of a Vector256 #76066
  • [wasm-mt] [uno] HttpClient calls fail with Unknown converter for type 13 #76063
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support multidimensional indexing of `object` scheme #76062
    8.0.0
  • Unhandled inner exception for NativeOverlapped used for multiple operations #76060
  • CPU intensive process left running after closing a winforms .Net6 app that uses OleDB #76054
    Future
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs as of RC1 #76049
    7.0.0
  • Improve Vector128.ExtractMostSignificantBits for arm64 #76047
    Future

Closed

  • CI failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.CertificateCreation.CertificateRequestLoadTests.VerifySignature_RSA_PSS(hashAlgorithm: "SHA512") #76099
  • .NET AWS Lambda function using .NET 7 RC1 fails to start when using a custom runtime on AWS Linux 2 on arm64 #75622
  • System.Text.Encoding.CodePages #76102
  • > There shouldn't be any long-lived pinning happening on other OSes. This is inherent to the Windows model for overlapped I/O, where the buffers are supplied to the receive/read calls performing the I/O; on Linux/macOS/etc., a buffer is only supplied under the covers once the implementation is notified data is available. I realize this isn't the intent of your issue, but if you have evidence of this happening anywhere other than Windows, I'd be interested in seeing it. #76100
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/OSR/largefuncletframe/largefuncletframe.sh #76085
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Avx1\\ConvertToVector_ro\\ConvertToVector_ro.cmd #75942
    8.0.0
  • Test failure GC/Features/HeapExpansion/bestfit/bestfit.sh #75941
    8.0.0
  • Project segfaults on Ubuntu ( ARM64 ) #76051
    7.0.0
  • HttpClient creates Quic threads even if HTTP/3 is not in use #74629
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\unittests\\RecursiveThrowNew\\RecursiveThrowNew.cmd #75944
    8.0.0
  • Expression compilation is slower in Net7. #76058
  • Crash - JIT/CheckProjects/CheckProjects/CheckProjects.sh #76070
    8.0.0
  • [WASM runtime test infrastucture] Environment variable is not set: 'CORE_ROOT' #41520
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'vnWx != NoVN' during 'Redundant branch opts' #72767
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Few perf-pipeline improvements #76111
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT #76109
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • JIT: refactor jump threading a bit #76108
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Don't use MS.Build.NoTargets SDK for runtime tests #76107
    area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure Vector64/128/256.Create APIs are intrinsic #76105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix triple slash documentation for System/System.Numerics #76103
    area-System.Numerics
  • Resolve missing triple-slash in Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives #76098
    area-Extensions-Primitives
  • Reduce allocations around empty ReadOnlyCollections #76097
    area-System.Collections
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Add workaround for msbuild issue in tests #76090
    area-Infrastructure
  • Bring back ReadOnlySpan in QuicStream #76088
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [mono][debugger] fix exception while decoding value that has a byref field #76086
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • [WIP] Make sure the initial mark list size is capped #76083
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.Reverse() for Vector128 #76076
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging an app that has another .NET Wasm instance in a service worker #76075
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging an app that has another .NET Wasm instance in a service worker #76073
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging an app that has another .NET Wasm instance in a service worker #76072
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [NativeAOT/iOS] Fix System.Private.Xml tests #76071
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Use generated runtime.json when building shared framework packages. #76068
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by non-numbers #76065
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • ZipArchive.CreateEntry: include file type in default ExternalAttributes. #76059
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Enable EventSource support in crossgen2 #76056
    Servicing-consider, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Disable EventSource support in NativeAOT by default #76052
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [NativeAOT] Ensure that frozen objects respect the minimum object size #76050
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix impIntrinsic to not raise asserts for the AltJit scenario #76048
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm][debugger] Support create, debugging and running wasmbrowser template from VS #75986
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [tests] Skip XslCompiledTransformApi tests on iOS, tvOS, and when testing native AOT #75730
  • [mono][interp] Remove random interp limit #76092
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • CI: trigger library tests builds, when building runtime tests #76057
    area-Infrastructure
  • [workloads] Work around main still targeting net7.0 #76036
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Disabling finalizer tests pending investigation. #76089
  • Adapt System.CommandLine (v2) in more places #72082
    blocked, area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Use gtCloneExpr in fgMorphModToSubMulDiv for potentially complex trees #76061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not maintain `GTF_VAR_MULTIREG` before lowering #75449
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disallow `ASG(..., IND<struct>)` before morph #74715
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Do not remove certain casts with contained operands #74602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Update gtHasLocalsWithAddrOp to use GenTreeVisitor #75672
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Close MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources (#75163, #75441) #75521
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • JIT: properly update trees in optOptimizeBoolsGcStress #75992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move TargetsLinuxBionic property, which depends on OutputRid #76078
  • Disable CheckProjects test on llvmaot. #76074
  • [release/7.0] Add missing DynamicallyAccessMembers attributes to System.Data.Common/ref #75980
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Enable EventSource support in crossgen2 #76053
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Ensure that frozen objects respect the minimum object size #76031
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [MONO][TEST] Update issues.targets for CheckProjects tests #76022
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix Dictionary perf regression for non-string ref type keys #75663
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • Disable EventSource support in NativeAOT by default #76000
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: fix issue with unreachable blocks in redundant branch opt #76040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix numeric IntPtr behavioral changes analyzer findings #75557
    area-Meta
  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [release/6.0] Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #76035
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #76034
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #75913
  • [wasm] Keep all icall wrappers in profile only mode, the generated co… #75918
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Clean up of SPC to match ref assembly public surface for Mono and CoreCLR #75954
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Flow internal transport packages during servicing #75979
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Add Vector128 ConditionalSelect intrinsics for Amd64 #75838
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasi] prevent mono on wasi from crashing on GC #76023
    area-GC-mono
  • Remove hardcoded limit in deserialization constructor arguments #75982
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add back missing conv opcodes when compiling via System.Linq.Expressions #76024
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Update il range in optOptimizeBoolsUpdateTrees #74657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add more optimizations for (https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/61412) #74806
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fix spilling of `MUL_LONG` on x86 and multi-reg HWIs #73079
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior; Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • WIP: [mono] Include inspection of CustomConstantAttribute when resolving default values for parameters via reflection #75612
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • JIT: Evaluate GDV call args early #75634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] fix exception while decoding value that has a byref field #75774
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [Mono][Test]Disable failing iossimulator tests #74889
  • Delete a bit more `OBJ(ADDR(...))` wrapping from `impNormStructVal` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold SIMD-typed partial access to locals; delete base types from vector constants #74580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Support a few "shifted register" operations on Arm64 #75823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Implement IEEE754 totalOrder comparer #75517
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Add and utilize number of contexts with diffs #76011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve List<T>.AddRange performance for enumerables #76043
    area-System.Collections
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    arch-arm64, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Prefer specific instances instead of gshared for methods … #76033
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Ensure gc collects memory for CriticalFinalizer test #76046
    community-contribution
  • Improve IPAddress to/from bytes perf #75872
    area-System.Net
  • Extend RuntimeHelpers.IsBitwiseEquatable to more types #75640
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix System.Runtime.InteropServices tests #75669
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MSB1001: Unknown switch; Switch: --project #28138
  • `dotnet test --filter` appears to have a hidden character count limitation for tests with long names #28118

Closed

  • [NetSDKE2E]Running "dotnet publish -f net7.0" with .net7 rc2 SDK,the output shown contains an invalid character "-". #28022

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve the example with specified language when language option is given with invalid option #28135
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2002421 #27667
  • Read PackageDefinitions and PackageDependencies from the cache assets file instead of ResolvePackageDependencies #28057
  • Handle test parser forwarded args #27961
    Area-DotNet Test, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28116
    Area-Infrastructure
  • revert perma-escaping of semicolons and support semicolon-delimited unquoted property values #27859
    Servicing-consider
  • Add --ucr shorthand for --use-current-runtime #27971
    Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Discussion: Permit static lambda assignment to function pointers #3476
  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set
  • [Open issue]: static abstract interfaces and static classes #5783
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Spec out as return only #6483

Merged

  • Fix reassign spelling error #6482

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No error reported for `ref` type in a declaration expression #64259
  • Replace `DeclarationScope` with `ScopedKind` #64248
    Compiler.Next
  • Building a .NET 7 RC1 Project with VS Causing CS8032 #64243
  • (a, b) is (int? x, int y) can be circumvented with (a, b) is (var x, var y) #64239
  • static interface methods not emitted when interface marked ComImport #64238
    17.4
  • Code completion for mixed whitespace characters in raw string #64237
  • Add a new Location.Create overload for external file location with a different mappedLineSpan #64236
    17.4

Closed

  • LSIF tool fails with duplicate analyzers #59883
    17.4
  • InvalidCastException: cannot cast NonErrorNamedTypeSymbol to IMethodSymbol #64251
  • Rename operation should have a wait dialog #62777
    17.4
  • C#, "Move to namespace" bad performance. #64072
    17.4
  • Inconsistent / missing errors for scoped keyword usages #62490
    17.4
  • A `ref T` field where `T` is `unmanaged` is itself treated as `unmanaged` #62528
    17.4
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32923.100 #64250
  • stackalloc should be disallowed for structs with ref fields #63104
    17.4
  • Invalid hyperlink in JavaScript diagnostics #64145
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Use AdditionalFilterTexts in enum member completion #64261
    Area-IDE
  • Allow TS to derive from the more performant internal API #64258
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow methods with bodies in ComImport interfaces. #64257
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl
  • Fix miscellaneous LSIF indexing issues to better match the 0.6.0 spec #64256
    Area-IDE
  • Support `scoped` keyword in `using` statements. #64245
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Improve ref assignment error message wording #64241
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add a new Location.Create overload for external file location with a different mappedLineSpan #64240
    Area-Analyzers

Merged

  • Only show expander in CS/VB document #64252
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix handling of duplicate analyzer references in CommandLineProject #64255
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64254
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove editor item from MatchResult #64229
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add ScopedKind to IParameterSymbol and ILocalSymbol #64190
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove double periods in telemetry properties #64247
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64249
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Try to reduce JIT costs for AbstractLogAggregator #64172
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add support to avoid showing F1 help for TS diagnostics #64242
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64244
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Support `scoped` keyword in `for` statement. #64154
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Support `scoped` keyword in `foreach` statement. #64209
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64233
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64235
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64234
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • Trigger refactor notify on Renamer.RenameDocumentAsync #55033
    Area-IDE
  • Check method arguments must match for property accessors #63809
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Format parameters as names in error messages #64179
    Area-Compilers
  • Use warnings for escape analysis in unsafe context #64186
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Remove code that thinks it needs to close a document before removing #64232
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for reporting analyzer diagnostics in editorconfig files #64214
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Fix confusing `ref` usage error messages #64183
    Area-Compilers
  • Record added node output states as new #61575
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider updating the static file middleware to return cache-control: no-cache in Development #44153
  • Apply tag helper attributes conditionally #44151
  • [Blazor WASM] Getting value from resx always return default value. #44150
  • Blazor Css Sandboxing Error with current VS version 17.3.4 #44149
  • [Blazor] "ValidateComplexType" does not work for dictionaries #44143
  • SignalR parallel client callback results in reduced performance on first invocation #44141
  • Rate limiting middleware - Statistics about rate limiters #44140
  • Using runtime built and dynamically-loaded dlls in Blazor Runtime causing issue in Kestrel hosting process. #44139

Closed

  • System.NullReferenceException: 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object.' bilgiislem.Models.Hesap.Role.get returned null. #43911
  • Using Lottie in Blazor #44109
  • Android SignalR Java Client - OnErrorNotImplementedException #44046
  • force full render / avoid differential render flag #44084
  • [NetSDKE2E]With NET7 RC2 installed, a duplicate template display in dotnet new --list #44095

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix ANCM hosting bundle conditions for older OS #44155
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44152
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/7.0] Update Roslyn Versions #44148
    area-infrastructure
  • fix dotnet#43523 HttpSys Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding conflicts #44144
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add comment to WebAssembly empty template about scoped CSS. Fixes #43975 #44142
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Try DOTNET_CLI_DO_NOT_USE_MSBUILD_SERVER #44147
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44022
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Retry template tests on helix #44145
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update BuildFromSource docs to be more scenario focused #44127
    Docs, area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix up packaging for Extensions.ApiDescription.Server #44136
    Servicing-approved, area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc2
  • Fix DetectMisplacedLambdaAttribute analyzer and tests #44061
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Update spa-templates to ref new 7.0 branch #44134
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, feature-spa, feature-templates, 7.0.0
  • Remove attributes from SVG elements #43957
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Update Roslyn versions #44072
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2002157 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Route tooling redux #44077
  • Add RequestDelegate analyzer #44048
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime
  • Add header dictionary analyzer and fixer #44123
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Change gRPC JSON to only accept top-level field as request body #44055
    Servicing-consider, area-grpc, 7.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #44135
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet-trace dumps stack if process cannot start #3381
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-dump collect process crash. Unable to read beyond the end of the stream. #3401
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixes unhandled exception on trace if process cannot start #3409

Merged

  • Fix int overflow found by vendor testing #3406
    auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [WinUI][MacOS?] An easy way to detect when App is closing and have the functionality to abort and stay in the app #10298
  • [WinUI][MacOS?] Disable/Enable/Show/Hide Close/Minimize/Maximize buttons easily #10297
  • [Bug] Binding on nested controls #10296
  • Navigation data is retained and also presented to IQueryAttributable on Back navigation. #10294
  • Button does not resize to fit text with CharacterSpacing #10293
  • Adding ContentPage - CS0103 The name 'InitializeComponent' does not exist in the current context #10292
  • FlyoutPage crashes when FlyoutLayoutBehavior sets to Split on iPad #10291
  • Using HorizontalStackLayout within ScrollView on Android, fails to display any data from display center to the right #10289
  • Page transition - MAUI Blazor #10288
  • Windows Capabilities in appxmanifest not properly used by building .msix #10287
  • MAUI iOS app is signed, but the used frameworks are not resigned #10284
  • ScrollView.ScrollToAsync not working if Childern.Add used in the same method #10283
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException on Android 11 TabbedPageManager.Listeners.OnPageSelected #10282
    .NET 7 Planning
  • this.Height is -1 in Page_loaded() in Android Maui. #10281

Closed

  • Android ImageSource.FromFile mistakenly displays MauiImage file rather than FileSystem file when filename is the same #9883
    6.0-sr5
  • WebView cannot show all web page content #8738
    Backlog
  • First Maui app on Visual Studio fails to build. dotnet/library-packs missing #10278
  • Android setting Image.Source to null does not remove previous image. #10210
  • Entry Control: When IsPassword is enabled, the placeholder text font is not the text font assigned to the Entry #10004

PullRequests

Created

  • Propagate Flyout Selected Item w/ AsMultipleItems #10295
  • Bumps for 7.0.0-rc2 #10290
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • First draft of pulling apart text wrapping, max lines, and text overflow #10279
    area/controls 🎮, control-label

Merged

  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.UI from 2.5.1 to 2.5.2 #10263
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.5.0 to 1.5.1 #10264
